title: Game Progress Route
content:
nocent will die today, Nere. Finish the Slaves, True Soul. For the Absolute. Say Nothing.

Select option 1 and Nere will be surprised that you care for the weak. You can respond with the following:

I came on the myconid sovereign's behalf. It demands revenge. I act on orders of the Absolute. Of course, I care. I can't let these gnomes suffer. This isn't about them. I just can't stand your face.

Select option 1 and Nere will order Sergeant Thrinn to kill you. You can respond with the following:
